title: The Moon Wolf Prince And The Omega Bride
alternative_title: 月狼皇子とオメガの花嫁
status: 月狼皇子とオメガの花嫁
description:
Description :
        Prince Mimi (?), the first prince whose country was taken after an invasion by a neighboring nation, was about to be sold into slavery. His childhood friend, Prince Luca (?) from an allied country, came to his rescue. Luka promised to restore Mimi's country, but his promise came with an outrageous condition!
